long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform the way you manage and access your favorite websites with ease and sophistication.

Key Features:

  - Effortless Bookmarking: Instantly save and organize your favorite websites for quick access every time you open a new tab.
  - Seamless Reading List: Easily add pages to a convenient reading list to catch up on your content whenever you have time.
  - Quick URL Copying: Use the simple shortcut Cmd+Shift+C to copy the current page URL instantly for sharing or saving.
